name: The Four Horsemen
description: Four Horsemen is the ultimate destination for foodies and fun-seekers in Bournemouth. Enjoy delicious pub grub, vegan options, and exciting events such as themed parties, live music, and quiz nights for an unforgettable night out!

name: DNA
description: Experience the ultimate party destination in Bournemouth at DNA. The best DJs and live music, themed club nights, cool lighting and sound, and VIP lounge for an exclusive night out. Amazing memories guaranteed!

name: Juniper Lounge
description: Juniper Lounge Bournemouth is a lively and stylish bar with a gin-centric concept, perfect for students. It offers an impressive range of gins, beers, and cocktails at affordable prices, as well as hosting exciting events including music, beer pong and large screen projector for sports games.

name: Slice of Dice
description: This store hosts exciting events for tabletop gamers, including board games, card games, and miniatures. With a welcoming atmosphere, spacious gaming area, and helpful staff, the store offers regular game nights, tournaments, and release parties, making it the ultimate destination for table top enthusiasts.

name: Smoking Aces
description: Discover the ultimate whiskey and cocktail bar experience in Bournemouth at Smokin' Aces. Satisfy your palate with an extensive selection of drinks, enjoy live music, comedy, and bingo events, and indulge in whiskey tastings and cocktail-making classes for a night of unforgettable fun!

name: Pause Cat Cafe
description: Pause Cat Cafe Bournemouth offers more than just a cozy atmosphere for cat lovers with its exciting lineup of themed events, such as cat yoga, bingo games, and movie nights. The playful and cuddly feline residents add to the fun, making it the purrfect destination for a unique day out or date with friends.

name: Flirt Cafe
description: Flirt Cafe Bournemouth is a cozy and quirky cafe that offers a playful atmosphere where you can enjoy homemade cakes, vegetarian and vegan options, and board games. The cafe's whimsical decor and friendly staff create a fun and relaxed environment, perfect for catching up with friends over coffee.
1812 Bar Bournemouth offers a stylish and luxurious atmosphere, with an extensive cocktail menu and impressive whiskey selection. Enjoy live music, DJ nights, and quiz nights at this vibrant venue.

name: Saxo
description: Saxo Bar Bournemouth offers a sophisticated night out with premium drinks, impeccable service, and live music events. With a sleek modern decor, it's the perfect destination for those seeking style, class, and entertainment.
